turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Dressing (medical).
turn.1: What is meant by a sterile dressing?
turn.2: Modern dressings will almost all come in a prepackaged sterile wrapping, date coded to ensure sterility.
turn.4: Sterility is necessary to prevent infection from pathogens resident within the dressing.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Historically, and still the case in many less developed areas and in an emergency, dressings are often improvised as needed.
turn.8: This can consist of anything, including clothing or spare material, which will fulfill some of the basic tenets of a dressing – usually stemming bleeding and absorbing exudate.
turn.10: Applying and changing dressings is one common task in nursing.
